sentence.Network_en: The company intends to squeeze further savings from its suppliers.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司试图从供货商那里再省下一笔费用。

sentence.Network_en: The film company collapsed, leaving Chris jobless and minus his life savings.
sentence.Network_cn: 电影公司垮了，克里斯没了工作，也失去了他一生的积蓄。

sentence.Network_en: Savings schemes are the best retail investment products on offer.
sentence.Network_cn: 储蓄方案是现有的最佳零售投资产品。

entry.def: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed.

example.ex: Fill in the form below and you will be making a saving of £6.60 on a one-year subscription.
example.tran: 填写以下表格，全年订阅即可为您节省 6.60英镑。

example.ex: ...a program of household savings on energy use.

entry.tran: (尤指在银行和购屋互助协会的)储蓄款，存款;积蓄
entry.def: Your savings are the money that you have saved, especially in a bank or a building society.

example.ex: Her savings were in the Post Office Savings Bank.
example.tran: 她的钱存在邮政储蓄银行里。

means.word_mean: 1. a fund of money put by as a reserve

Sentence.sentence: Some businesses will benefit but the vast bulk of the savings will be captured by workers, not their employers.
They also calculated the cost savings emerging from the amount of disease that would be avoided because of lower blood pressure
The rest of the energy savings comes from the solar units.
Because healthy savings rates are one of the surest indicators of a country's long-term financial health.
High savings lead, over time, to increased investment, which in turn generates productivity gains, innovation and job growth
In short, savings are the seed corn of a good economic harvest.
